synz.autoAttach.description: Automatically inject when Roblox is detected. The menu button will indicate if this is active.

synz.quickAccess.description: Show status bar buttons for executing and attaching when Roblox is open.

synz.logOutput.description: Show messages from the Roblox console in the VSCode output panel. This executes a script after attaching. If you're having detection issues, disable this.

synz.automaticallyDetectRobloxProcess.description: Disabling this will break certain features like auto-attaching and automatic hiding of the attach/execute buttons. Only disable if you're having compatability issues.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
